cast.overview: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.
cast.title: The Great Beauty

details.biography:
Serena Grandi (born on March 23, 1958 in Bologna) is an Italian actress, famous as an icon and sex symbol in Italian cinema of 1980s and 1990s. Known for her junoesque body and voluptuous measurements, she was considered one of the main pin-up girls of Italy.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Serena Grandi, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Serena Grandi
